text: wooooooot i got clearance to skip Partner Day. My boss will cover that obligation so I can go to the meetup. i may not make 9am, depending on how the flight goes, but now I can volunteer for a bit.

The event’s going to be great, a lot of hard work has gone into it so far and there’s a fair amount left to get done. We’re down to the most exciting parts now though.

The best part is that all of our effort into this event will provide a framework for community developer events in the future. We plan to make it easy for others to see what we did, improve upon it, borrow any resources we’ve created in the process, and learn from our mistakes and successes. Kinda like it’s being open sourced. If anyone’s interested in running future events, <@U22PKFRU5> will have all the information once the event is over.
.

topic: Developer Community Event, Presentations, Socializing, September 3rd. More details at: <https://devday.splashthat.com/>
text: set the channel topic: Developer Community Event, Presentations, Socializing, September 3rd. More details at: <https://devday.splashthat.com/>

Oh and if it’s not inherently obvious, Luke Summerfield, Nick Decker, Dennis Edson, AJ Laporte, Mark Ryba, and I will all be there. I know several of you have said things like “We should meet up during Inbound”. well this will be the best place and time to do that!
